title: Australia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Flip someone’s post number upside down. Their abilities and attributes will be replaced by those of the post number opposite of theirs. Their win condition does not change. (e.g. if someone’s post number is n and there are x total roles then their new abilities will be that of post x-n)
- Poison someone. If they take any actions aside from speaking for the next day and night, they will be killed immediately. (Costs 3 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If any Civilization is attacked and survives, they can perform two attacks the next time they perform the factional kill.
- Mainframe and Android post numbers are not included in the first ability. If you target a Mainframe or Android with this ability, then nothing happens. You are not informed of this.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were bested by an Australian digger.” (Factional Kill)
“You were bitten by a snake. You must stay home to recover!” (Poisoned)

desc:
Post 1717
